KillerMaxBloodCharge.Description: The maximum amount of event charge that a killer can hold

SurvivorMaxBloodCharge.Description: The maximum amount of event charge that a survivor can hold

KillerTimeToPlaceZone.Description: Killer interaction time when using a charge to create a blood zone

SurvivorTimeToPlaceZone.Description: Survivor interaction time when using a charge to create a blood zone

BloodChargeCollectTriggerRadius.Description: cm. The trigger size where player can collect a blood charge.

SurvivorZoneProtectedTimer.Description: Survivor blood zone is in the protected state for the duration of the tunable

KillerZoneProtectedTimer.Description: Killer blood zone is in the protected state for the duration of the tunable

SurvivorTimeToRemoveZone.Description: Survivor interaction time when removing a vulnerable blood zone origin point

KillerTimeToRemoveZone.Description: killer interaction time when removing a vulnerable blood zone origin point

BloodZoneEffectRadius.Description: cm. Blood zone area of effect radius

AuraReadingDistanceWhenCharged.Description: cm. Aura reveal distance of blood zone placements for players with a charge

BloodZoneMinimumSpawnDistance.Description: cm. Minimum distance the blood zones placement can spawn from each other

BloodZoneLowerHeightDifference.Description: cm. The lower height difference where a player would be considered in the radius of the blood zone

BloodZoneUpperHeightDifference.Description: cm. The upper height difference where a player would be considered in the radius of the blood zone

DreamLevelOneMultiplier.Description: Multiplier for the Blood point rewards within the blood zone when the community blood dream level is 1

DreamLevelTwoMultiplier.Description: Multiplier for the Blood point rewards within the blood zone when the community blood dream level is 2

DreamLevelThreeMultiplier.Description: Multiplier for the Blood point rewards within the blood zone when the community blood dream level is 3

DreamLevelFourMultiplier.Description: Multiplier for the Blood point rewards within the blood zone when the community blood dream level is 4

KillerBonusLungeTime.Description: Extra lunge time percent when in the blood zone

KillerLungePenalityTime.Description: Lunge recovery time penality percentage per extra second of lunge given by the blood zone

SurvivorBonusInjureNoiseReduction.Description: Survivor injured sound percent while in a zone

SurvivorCrouchedBonusInjureNoiseReductio.Description: Survivor injured sound percent while crouching in a zone

SurvivorBonusBloodRemoval.Description: Survivor blood pool time percent while in a zone

SurvivorCrouchedBonusBloodRemoval.Description: Survivor injured blood pool time percent while crouching in a zone

OfferingBloodReceptacleAuraTimer.Description: Aura duration extension for blood receptacles at the start of the trial for players with the offering

BloodReceptacleAuraTimer.Description: Base duration of the blood receptacle aura at the start of the trial
